featured.title: Phantom Gear
featured.description: Phantom Gear mixes elements from a variety of classic action platformers for a unique and exciting package, and allows players to approach the game how they see fit. Lock ‘n’ load to power through levels, or use your skills and abilities to search for Gears and Orbs.

featured.title: Xump 2
featured.description: Xump 2 is a simple multi-platform puzzler by Retroguru. Help Misuki clean up deserted space fields. Obstacles like mines, teleport sectors and arrow walkways appear progressively throughout the game.

featured.title: Himes Quest
featured.description: It’s 1999, and something electric is in the air. A malevolent force has crept into New Crunchy City, wreaking havoc on its technology and tragically destroying the Anime Club’s DVD / VCR combo player. Enter Hime to save the day!
